```{css}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Float four columns side by side */
.column {
  float: left;
  width: 50%;
  padding: 15px 15px;
}

/* Remove extra left and right margins, due to padding */
.row {margin: 0 -5px;}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}

/* Responsive columns */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .column {
    width: 100%;
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
}

/* Style the counter cards */
.card {
  padding: 0px;
  text-align: left;
  background-color: white;
}

.card-title {
  font-weight: bold; 
}

.card-date {
  color: #9E9E9E;
}

.card-description {
  color: #757575;
}
```

```{r Card container}
library(htmltools)


create_card <- function(title, 
                        date,
                        description,
                        url,
                        image_source) {
  
  card <- tags$div(
    class = "column",
    tags$div(
      class = "card",
      tags$a(
        href = url,
        target = "_blank",
        tags$img(src = image_source, style = "width:100%"),
        tags$div(class = "card-title", title),
        tags$div(class = "card-date", date),
        tags$div(class = "card-description", description)
      )
    )
  )
  
  return(card)
  
}


# Create the card in chronological order with the most recent project
# placed on top
tags$div(
```
